madkitgroupextension.kernel

Interface MKGEScheduler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GroupChangementNotifier, MKGEAbstractAgent, MKGEAgent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Scheduler

    public interface MKGEScheduler
extends MKGEAgent
    This is the common interface for the next MadKitGroupExtension agents : Scheduler. This documentation is copied/pasted and adapted from the MadKit documentation.
    Since:
    MadKitGroupExtension 1.2.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jason Mahdjoub

    • Method Detail

      • getDelay

        int getDelay()
        Returns the delay between two simulation steps
        Returns:
        the delay between two simulation steps.

      • setDelay

        void setDelay(int delay)
        Sets the delay between two simulation steps. That is the pause time between to call to doSimulationStep()
        Parameters:
        delay - the pause between two steps in ms, an integer between 0 and 400: O is max speed. speed

      • getGVT

        double getGVT()
        Returns the simulation global virtual time.
        Returns:
        the gVT

      • setGVT

        void setGVT(double GVT)
        Sets the simulation global virtual time.
        Parameters:
        GVT - the actual simulation time

      • doSimulationStep

        void doSimulationStep()
        Executes all the activators in the order they have been added, using the and increment the global virtual time of this scheduler by one unit. This method should be overridden to define customized scheduling policy. So default implementation is : 
         @Override
 public void doSimulationStep() {
        if (logger != null) {
                logger.finer("Doing simulation step "+GVT);
        }
        for (final Activator‹?› activator : m_activators) {
                triggerActivator(activator);
        }
        setGVT(getGVT() + 1);
 }
